data.title: What is the name of the Griffin family dog?
data.hints: This dog is known for his talking abilities and sarcastic remarks.

data.title: What is the name of Lois Griffin's father?
data.hints: He is a wealthy businessman and often clashes with Peter.

data.title: What is the name of the town where the Griffin family lives?
data.hints: It's a fictional Rhode Island town where all the Family Guy characters reside.

data.title: What is the name of the bar where Peter, Joe, Quagmire, and Cleveland go to?
data.hints: This bar is often seen as the guys' hangout spot.

data.title: What is the name of Stewie Griffin's teddy bear?
data.hints: This bear is Stewie's only real friend, and they have a complicated relationship.

data.title: What is the name of the chicken who is Peter Griffin's nemesis?
data.hints: This giant chicken and Peter have a long-running feud, often resulting in epic battles.

data.title: What is the name of the news anchor on Channel 5?
data.hints: This character is known for his deadpan humor and frequent appearances on the show.

data.title: What is the name of the police officer who is Joe Swanson's partner?
data.hints: This character is a police officer who also often joins the group of friends.

data.title: What is the name of the mall that the Griffin family frequently goes to?
data.hints: This mall is a regular backdrop for various antics involving the Griffin family.

data.title: Who does Stewie want to kill?
data.hints: Stewie's primary target is often his mother, Lois, in his quest for world domination.

data.title: Where was Peter born?
data.hints: This country is famously associated with some of Peter's humorous antics and stories.

data.title: Which Family Guy character is obsessed with world domination?
data.hints: This character, who is a baby, has constant plans to take over the world.

data.title: Who is the mayor of Quahog?
data.hints: This eccentric character is always seen doing strange things as the town's mayor.

data.title: Who founded the city of Quahog?
data.hints: The founder is a historical character, and his name often comes up in Family Guy history.

data.title: What did Peter change Meg's name to on her birth certificate?
data.hints: Peter, in his usual comedic fashion, changed Meg's name to something quite absurd.

data.title: Who burned The Drunken Clam to the ground?
data.hints: Peter is the cause of this destruction, causing chaos at his favorite hangout spot.
